short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blacklist distracting Slack channels so you can stay in flow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes Slack less distracting by only allowing you to open whitelisted channels and private messages. For any other channel, you have to answer a series of annoying questions that force you to consider whether you really want to risk getting taken out of flow.
